features: Premium scouring Pads are made for durability, which has powerful cleaning effect and not easy to tear and wear out even after numerous uses(Always test in small area prior to ensure no scratching occurs).

Sturdy abrasive scour pads scrub off stuck-on food, grease, grime fast and effectively, help you to keep your kitchen and household appliances shiny and neat after every use, which features optimal cleaning performance.
Strong yet flexible to access tight corners, hard to reach areas and tough enough for commercial and household use. These heavy duty scrubbing pads are perfect for abrasive cleaning and scrubbing.

The scrub pads won't rust or splinter like steel wool, and they are easy to rinse clean and ready for next use, an essential scrubber for your kitchen cleaning. These multi-purpose dish scrubber won't hurt your hands, they are great for cleaning cast iron pots, grills, broilers, garage etc. Not for aquarium use.
BULK PACK & SAVE MONEY. You pay less, but get a value pack, each package comes with 24 pcs and allows you to use for a decent amount of time.
description: Product Description MR.SIGA Heavy Duty Scouring Pads(Abrasive) MR.SIGA Heavy Duty Scouring Pads remove stubborn grease, grime, and food residue,they are designed for tough cleaning tasks in the kitchen, dishes, garage and more. 24 Pack The pack of 24 ensures you always have plenty of scouring pads on hand, making it convenient to replace them as needed. Long Lasting Kitchen Scouring Pds These scouring pads are made from high-quality materials that are resistant to wear and tear, ensuring they can withstand repeated use. Excellent Cleaning Performance Feature an abrasive surface that provides excellent scrubbing power, making it easier to tackle even the toughest messes.
